actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to transfer the United States ship Constitution to the Philadelphia Naval Shipyard, Philadelphia, Pa.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Navy to transfer the United States ship Constitution from the Boston Naval Shipyard to the Philadelphia Naval Shipyard.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to transfer the United States ship Constitution to the Philadelphia Naval Shipyard, Philadelphia, Pa.
